statements: DELETE FROM product_demand WHERE product_id = 101 AND season = 'Summer';
DELETE FROM products WHERE product_id = 5 AND category = 'Electronics';
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10 AND location LIKE '%Store%';
DELETE FROM forecasts WHERE forecast_month <= '2023-01-01' AND forecasted_demand < 50
